scenario.name: Mobicents SIP Presence functional Tests - Publication - Full OMA Doc

PUBLISH sip:publisher[call_number]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: publisher[call_number] <sip:publisher[call_number]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: publisher[call_number] <sip:publisher[call_number]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 PUBLISH Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 3600 Event: presence Content-Type: application/pidf+xml Content-Length: [len]
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <presence xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf" xmlns:pdm=" urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:data-model" xmlns:rpid="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:rpid" xmlns:op="urn:oma:xml:prs:pidf:oma-pres" xmlns:gp="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10" xmlns:cl="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10:civicAddr" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:lt="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:location-type" xmlns:opd="urn:oma:xml:pde:pidf:ext" xmlns:opd1.1="urn:oma:xml:pde:pidf:ext:1.1" xmlns:caps="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:caps" entity="sip:publisher[call_number]@[remote_ip]">

PUBLISH sip:publisher[call_number]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: publisher[call_number] <sip:publisher[call_number]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: publisher[call_number] <sip:publisher[call_number]@[remote_ip]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 PUBLISH Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 0 Event: presence SIP-If-Match: [$etag] [routes] Content-Length: 0
